title: CryptoBot
description: An automated cryptocurrency trading bot designed to analyze market trends, execute trades, and optimize strategies using real-time data and advanced indicators. It supports multiple exchanges and includes risk management features. So far 10% per 6 months

title: Parts Scraper â€“ Image Analyzer
description: A production-grade scraper that collects part numbers from supplier websites and automatically retrieves and analyzes official product images. Developed as an internal tool for a U.S. company, capable of handling thousands of parts efficiently.

title: Face Recognition App
description: Intelligent React application utilizing Clarifai AI API for automatic face detection and highlighting in images, featuring complete authentication system and user activity tracking. Demonstrates integration of machine learning services with real-time visualization and modern UI including animated particles background.
